A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Good bye Star Wars. I've loved this series my whole life and after this one I'm done. I will no longer give Disney one more dime to watch them rid themselves of characters I've gone my whole life loving just to make way for a new generation. They made Luke go from a man that loved family and had hope of redemption to a man of dispare that in the end has no hope of redemption for a loved one. Rian Johnson you've ruined Star Wars for an avid fan. So this will be my last dime spent to ruin a great movie series. With so many books and stories to pull a good narrative from why would you make such a pile of garbage movie? It was mind boggling.
